testsuite.name: Connection Scheme Service Implementation Tests - Kafka Version

testcase.name: Update scheme - Negative: Client UID change attempt
Create scheme - Negative: Scheme already exists
Update scheme - Negative: UID change attempt
Health check - Negative: Auth service error
Create scheme - Negative: Client UID mismatch
Scheme exists - Negative: Scheme not found
Health check - Negative: Auth service timeout
Get scheme by UID - Negative: Scheme doesn't belong to client
